word_mean: 习惯化：对刺激或环境的逐渐适应
去习惯化，去条件化：多次重复的条件刺激消除已形成的条件反射
成瘾：因重复使用某药物而有持续应用该药的愿望，但无明显加大剂量的倾向，对该药物可能有心理依赖性而非躯体依赖性，如有有害影响，亦只限于个体
当刺激连续或重复发生时，动物行为的频次与强度所发生的持久性衰减甚至消失的过程。广义来说，就是动物学会对一个特定的刺激不发生反应。

sentence.Network_en: Exposure may produce olfactory fatigue or habituation.
sentence.Network_cn: 接触可以引起嗅觉疲劳或成瘾.

sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, habituation applies to positive aspects of our lives as well.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是, 这种适应性也体现在我们对待生活的积极一面上.

sentence.Network_en: How do prevent from hypnotizing the medicine habituation?
sentence.Network_cn: 如何预防催眠药物成瘾?

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...动物行为习惯化编辑习惯化(habituation)是动物界最常见的最简单的一种学习行类)所谓习惯化就是当刺激连续或重复发生时会引起动物反应的持久性衰减就广义来说，习惯化就是动物学会对特定的刺激不发生反应，例如，一只鸟必须学.
habitual dislocation 习惯性脱位habituation 习性形成hachement 掌缘花
アラビノガラクタンの 性质も持っていると判定した.これらの结果は,発见以来谜の多い驯化 (habituation) の分子机构に関する 初めての证拠となると考.

list.abs: 禁治产人 imbecile； interdicted person经常居住地：habitual residence经法律确认的 ascertained by law
habit spasm 抽搐habitual dislocation 习惯性脱位habituation 习性形成
(六)习惯性流产(habitual abortion)：连续3次以上自然流产称为习惯性流产，且流产往往发生于同一月份，而流产的过程可经历前述的 …
美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... habeas corpus 人身保护法 habitual offender 惯犯 habitual sex offender 性惯犯.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'formation of habit'): from French or from Latin habitatio(n)-, from late Latin habituare (see habituate)

means.word_mean: 1. being abnormally tolerant to and dependent on something that is psychologically or physically habit-forming (especially alcohol or narcotic drugs)
2. a general accommodation to unchanging environmental conditions

auth_sentence.content: Habituation shows that memory and cognition are developing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Habituation shows that memory and cognition are developing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Habituation shows that memory and cognition are developing.

auth_sentence.content: Habituation occurs when people become accustomed to simply pressing the "yes" button when faced with an alert or warning.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Habituation occurs when people become accustomed to simply pressing the "yes" button when faced with an alert or warning.

auth_sentence.content: "Habituation is why you don't notice the stuff that's always there," Schooler says.
